alert.note: Alert for Meriwether; Pike; Talbot; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 9:23PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Meriwether, southern Pike, northwestern Upson and north central Talbot Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 923 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Crest, or 7 miles west of Thomaston, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds 40 to 50 mph and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Zebulon, Molena, Meansville, Sunset Village, Lincoln Park, The Rock, Concord, Atwater, Hilltop, Lifsey Springs, Sprewell Bluff State Park, Crest, Sunnyside and Hannahs Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Electrical appliances should not be used unless in an emergency.
